shareCodeWhispererContentWithAWS.title: Share content with Amazon Q Developer
shareCodeWhispererContentWithAWS.description: When checked, your content processed by Q Developer may be used for service improvement. Unchecking this box will cause AWS to delete any of your content used for that purpose. The information used to provide the Q Developer service to you will not be affected.

suggestionsWithCodeReferences.title: Enable suggestions with code references
suggestionsWithCodeReferences.description: Amazon Q creates a code reference when you insert a code suggestion from Amazon Q that is similar to training data. When unchecked, Amazon Q will not show code suggestions that have code references. If you authenticate through IAM Identity Center, this setting is controlled by your Amazon Q administrator.

codeWhispererTelemetry.title: Share Content With AWS
codeWhispererTelemetry.description: When checked, your content processed by Amazon Q may be used for service improvement (except for content processed for users with the Amazon Q Developer Pro Tier). Unchecking this box will cause AWS to delete any of your content used for that purpose. The information used to provide the Amazon Q service to you will not be affected. For more details, refer to Section 50.13 of the AWS Service Terms, available at https://aws.amazon.com/service-terms/.

codeWhispererLogLevel.title: Amazon Q Developer Log level
codeWhispererLogLevel.description: Amazon Q Developer extension's console log level (changes reflected on page refresh)
